EmailTemplate.name: RE: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program! (1355778278.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program! (1355778278.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Eddie, As I mentioned in my email last week, we do have the ability to click on a link on the referral site that will connect directly to your Linkedin and Facebook as well as other social networking sites once you have entered a referral in our system and per your suggestion are looking into having those links available on the main page in the next release. I had specialized links created for you so that it will track any referrals that sign up with MBO from your network and they are included below in lieu of you entering a direct referral on our site. Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?s=100&p[title]=A%20Service%20Just%20for%20Independent%20Consultants&p[summary]=For%20those%20professionals%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path,%20MBO%20Partners%20handles%20the%20ordinary%20so%20you%20can%20be%20extraordinary.&p[url]=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller <http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?s=100&p%5btitle%5d=A%20Service%20Just%20for%20Independent%20Consultants&p%5bsummary%5d=For%20those%20professionals%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path,%20MBO%20Partners%20handles%20the%20ordinary%20so%20you%20can%20be%20extraordinary.&p%5burl%5d=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller> LinkedIn:http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller&title=Service%20Just%20for%20Independent%20Consultants&summary=For%20those%20professionals%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path,%20MBO%20Partners%20handles%20the%20ordinary%20so%20you%20can%20be%20extraordinary <http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller&title=Service%20Just%20for%20Independent%20Consultants&summary=For%20those%20professionals%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path,%20MBO%20Partners%20handles%20the%20ordinary%20so%20you%20can%20be%20extraordinary>. Twitter:http://twitter.com/home?status=I%20recommend%20checking%20out%20MBO%20Partners%20if%20you%20are%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path%20http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller <http://twitter.com/home?status=I%20recommend%20checking%20out%20MBO%20Partners%20if%20you%20are%20seeking%20an%20independent%20consulting%20path%20http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller> Google+:https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller <https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Eddie%2520Miller> Please let me know if you have any additional feedback regarding our referral program/site and thank you for the suggestions. Have a great day and Happy Holidays! Nicolette From: EDDIE MILLER [mailto:jereleen@bellsouth.net] Sent: Thursday, December 13, 2012 7:49 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program! You need to setup your Referral Program wherein I can use my linkedin and facebook friends. I like the idea of one click and the rest is history, just make sure that the person is ID's so that they will get the credit. Take a look at my linked in page or facebook page because it will give you an idea as to the kind of people and businesses that I am connected too and at the same time allow me as an Independent Contractor to make some real money and at the same time help a worthy cause, otherwise I am not interested. Ed Miller Regional Patient Care Manager HEALTH CARE PRODUCTS LLC 514 West Maple Street, Suite 1201Cumming, GA 30040 Office: 803-614-0413: 877.600.0205Fax 678.455.2761 www.healthcareproductsllc.com <http://www.healthcareproductsllc.com> Email: edm@healthcareproductsllc.com <mailto:edm@healthcareproductsllc.com> http://www.twincityoutreach.org <http://www.twincityoutreach.org> From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> To: jereleen@bellsouth.net <mailto:jereleen@bellsouth.net> Sent: Thu, December 13, 2012 3:50:15 PM Subject: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program! Dear Ed, I am thrilled to announce that we have recently launched a brand new Referral Program with some serious perks you will want to know about!
Our greatest compliment is when an Associate like you spreads the word about us to friends and colleagues that would benefit from utilizing our services. The projected future size of independent workers is expected to climb to 23 million within the next 5 years, so our mission is more important than ever- making it easy for independent consultants and their clients to do business together. We believe that no good deed should go unnoticed, which is why when you refer a friend, every referral you submit gives you a chance to win a home office makeover worth up to $5,000! *You will also be giving your friend the opportunity to try us for free. Finally, if your friend likes what we do, we will deposit $500 into your Business Center upon their enrollment and subsequent billings of $30,000. *Restrictions apply. See contest rules <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTI3OTUtMTAzNjMtMC0yMTE4LXByb2QtMTQ0NyZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9MCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTE0NDcmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTk2ODkwNjUmZW1haWxpZD1qZXJlbGVlbkBiZWxsc291dGgubmV0JnVzZXJpZD02NTY2NC0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/official-rules?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvKXMZKXonjHpfsX%2B7uorXbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2oIARNQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> for details.
Start referring today! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPW1ib0JldGFjdXN0LTI3OTUtMTAzNjMtMC0yMTE4LXByb2QtMTQ0NyZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9MCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTE0NDcmc2VyaWFsPTEyOTk2ODkwNjUmZW1haWxpZD1qZXJlbGVlbkBiZWxsc291dGgubmV0JnVzZXJpZD02NTY2NC0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=Taylor&fname=Ed&lname=Miller&email=jereleen@bellsouth.net&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvKXMZKXonjHpfsX%2B7uorXbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2oIARNQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> Sincerely, ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO PartnersIf you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvKXMZKXonjHpfsX%2B7uorXbHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2oIARNQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>T
